Class ScaleFreeGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • Graph
      • ScaleFreeGraph

  • public class ScaleFreeGraph
extends Graph
    This Class constructs BA (Barabasi and Albert) Scale-Free graphs, working with a fixed number of nodes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int graphSeed
      In this variable is stored the seed number that feeds the random pseudogenerator and allows the creation of reproducible graphs.
      int numOfActivatedNodes
      In this variable is stored the number of nodes that have edges.
      int numOfConnectedEdges
      In this variable is stored the total number of connencted edges of the Scale-Free graph.

      • Fields inherited from class Graph

        adjacencyMatrix, vertexNumber, vertices

      Creates a new instance of Custom Scale-Free by using as arguments the the maximum number of edges, the number of vertices-nodes the graph will have and the seed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void check(int numOfVertices)
      Check adjacency among veritces and print results either on screen or on file
      void printTopology(int numOfVertices, java.lang.String topologyFilePath)
      Prints Graph Topology on a text file and is stored in the classpath defined by the topologyFilePath argument.
      The integer argument numOfVertices is the number of vertices/nodes of the graph.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScaleFreeGraph

        public ScaleFreeGraph(int numOfVertices,
              int totalNumOfEdges,
              int seed)
        Creates a new instance of Custom Scale-Free by using as arguments the the maximum number of edges, the number of vertices-nodes the graph will have and the seed.
        The algorithm works as follows:
        1. If the number of edges is less than the predefined preferred number, select randomly a vertex and connect it with probability P(ki) = ki/Sum(jkj) to the vertex i.
        2. Repeat step 1

    • Method Detail

      • printTopology

        public void printTopology(int numOfVertices,
                 java.lang.String topologyFilePath)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Prints Graph Topology on a text file and is stored in the classpath defined by the topologyFilePath argument.
        The integer argument numOfVertices is the number of vertices/nodes of the graph.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
